name: rili-server
description: The server side code for Rili

scripts.start:redis:dev: docker run --name rili-redis-pub-dev -d -p 17771:6379 redis:5.0.3 && docker run --name rili-redis-sub-dev -d -p 17772:6379 redis:5.0.3
scripts.start:redis:prod: docker run --name rili-redis-pub -d -p 17771:6379 redis:5.0.3 && docker run --name rili-redis-sub -d -p 17772:6379 redis:5.0.3
scripts.start:redis:cli: docker run -it --link rili-redis-dev:redis --name rili-redis-cli --rm redis redis-cli -h redis -p 16379:6379
scripts.stop:redis:dev: docker stop rili-redis-pub-dev && docker rm rili-redis-pub-dev && docker stop rili-redis-sub-dev && docker rm rili-redis-sub-dev && docker stop rili-redis-cli && docker rm rili-redis-cli
scripts.stop:redis:prod: docker stop rili-redis-pub && docker rm rili-redis-pub && docker stop rili-redis-sub && docker rm rili-redis-sub

author: Rili, Inc.
